title: Bishop Museum
seo_title: Bishop Museum in Waikiki | Attractions in Waikiki
seo_description: There is no better place to discover the comprehensive and complex history, arts and culture of the Hawaiian people than at the Bishop Museum.
contents_1: There is no better place to discover the comprehensive and complex history, arts and culture of the Hawaiian people.
Price: $19.95 Adults; Discounts for seniors, children, kamaaina and military
description: There is no better place to discover the comprehensive and complex history, arts and culture of the Hawaiian people. The Bernice Pauahi Bishop Museum is recognized throughout the world for scientific research, educational programs, and extensive collections which give voice to the stories of Hawaii and the broader Pacific. The museum also has large lawn spaces that are ideal for picnics.
